title: 100 Reasons You'll Never Be Bored in Barcelona
text:
Top 100 Things to Do in Barcelona Spain You'll never get bored in Barcelona! Spain Travel Expert By Paul Cannon 
We could make it a thousand things to do in Barcelona , but for the moment a hundred will do. From Pedralbes Monastery to the Picasso Museum, Gaudi to the Grácia Festival, here's our heavyweight list of a hundred things to do in Barcelona. 
So get your Barcelona metro ticket - the ideal way to get around the city - and off you go. 
More things to do in Barcelona: shlomp-a-plompa @shlomp flickr.com Creative Commons License • 100 Things to Do in Barcelona by Subject and District 
If you're looking for a particular type of activity, check out this breakdown of our 100 Things to Do in Barcelona: 2 Barcelona Events 
But the best way to split Barcelona is into districts, beginning in the centre and working our way out to the suburbs. Each area is easily worth a day of your time, but depending on time restraints each can be covered in one morning or afternoon. 
Don't want to take our word for it? There are nearly 200 things to do in Barcelona that have been selected by the users of Tripadvisor. Check out Tripadvisor's Things to do in Barcelona for some alternative ideas. 
continue reading below our video Long-Haul Flight Survival Tips • Ten Things to Do Around Las Ramblas 
Spain's most famous promenade can be a river of tourists, but it's worth getting swept in for a couple of hours to enjoy the stalls, human statues and eclectic mix of landmarks, from ceramics by Mirò to the Liceu Theatre and elegant but seedy Plaça Reial.
